Description of incident: Express Scripts has received a              letter demanding money from the company under the threat of exposing              records of millions of patients. The letter, included personal information              on 75 people covered by Express Scripts, including birth dates, Social              Security numbers and prescription information. Express manages prescription              benefits for roughly 50 million people. UPDATE 10/1/09: Express Scripts notified about 700,000 consumers that their records may have been breached.
